content.detailedDescription: I went outside for a break and looked up to see a silver disc traveling from northeast to southwest.  i stared at it to determine if the shape was really a disc. it had no protusions that i could see. it was a very bright, almost white silver and about the hieght of a small airplane. i could hear no sound as it passed over.
content.summary: Silver disc traveling in daylight over denton

content.detailedDescription: I was out putting up the waterhose and looked up at the crescent moon and noticed these colored lights traveling from the soutwest to the northeast. i watched thinking it a jet when i realized that the lights were flashing erractically and were multicolored. i continued to watch and also noticed that it was not always traveling in a straight line, but at times would zig zag and then go straight and it repeated this behavior until it just vanished before my eyes! as it passed over me i expected to hear a sound indicated i was mistaking a jet for something else, but no sound was ever heard.
content.summary: Erractically flashing colored lights traveling rapididly in straight and zig zag lines

content.detailedDescription: Traveling on u.S.1 south bound jensen beach area,notice 3 disc shaped objects in horizontal formation,objects appeared to be very large considering the distance 10-15 miles away.These were not like looking at dots in the sky,they were of significant size and seemed to be over the ocean,my position for the viewing was approx.4.5 miles inland.The st.Lucie nuclear plan is not far from this point to the north 6 miles approx ,4-5 years ago myself ,my mother and husband witnessed 3 stationary round objects in the same general area  that sat in one spot for 9-10 mins before rapidly moving across the from east to west in the blink of an eye.Just an awsome expiriance on both occasions
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 dick shaped objects looking east ,

content.detailedDescription: Seeing several chemtrails appear in the sky over the lake, i had a weird feeling and decided to snap a picture of the sky. although not visible when the shot was taken, the same rectangular object i shot last summer again appeared in the photo along with some odd light manifestations. the dark rectangle is visible hanging under the "lightning bolt" and hole that also was not visible when the shot was taken. as a control i used a different camera from the shot taken last year.  i also used a camera that i know picks up infra-red (a simple test you can perform by pointing your tv remote at the camera and snapping a picture when a button is depressed. if you see the light coming from the remote, it has no filter for infra-red, as many cheaper digitals don't). i have again included a shot from turkey taken last year over istanbul where the same ufo is visible. in this shot the clouds infringe into the shape so it is obviously not a camera artifact. this plus another shot that brian vike supplied me, demonstrates that this same ufo has now been caught in four shots-2 from ny here on the lake, one in the uk and one from istanbul turkey which i have attached-all over water. the turkey photo still was taken from a video posted on youtube <http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=w5bteyb0ddy>. interestingly, in the forbidden city of china-a city built to mimic the "palace" of the gods- a statue shows the emporer wearing a hat with the exact same shape. coincidence? thanks brett allen
content.summary: Ufo again photographed over great sacandaga lake ny

content.detailedDescription: On sunday night, aug 3 at 9pm, i was sitting on my front porch talking with my brother. i told him i just saw 2 white circles to the right of our tree. they were side by side and bright white but not like the moon with illumination. the circles were perfectly outlined. not much space between the two. almost as soon as i saw them they just disappeared. they did not move. they were just gone. while still on the phone with tim, i told him not 5 mins later there's another one. the exact same size as the first 2. as soon as i saw it, it was gone exactly like the first 2. i couldn't help but notice because they were bright white but not like shining lights or the moon. they did not appear luminous, just white but perfectly shaped circles. i wasn't scared but obviously wanted to know what they might be. if i had thought someone would have believed me, i would have called 911. i am just now reporting what i saw because i got the newspaper and saw where mr. dietz saw something too. so i am telling what i saw only because someone else saw something that could have been the same thing. i would love to have been able to take a picture but they did not stay but an instant.
content.summary: 2 white circles appeared side by side then disappeared. 5 mins later 1 appeared and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: On sunday night, aug 3 at 9pm, i was sitting on my front porch talking with my brother. i told him i just saw 2 white circles to the right of our tree. they were side by side and bright white but not like the moon with illumination. the circles were perfectly outlined. not much space between the two. almost as soon as i saw them they just disappeared. they did not move. they were just gone. while still on the phone with tim, i told him not 5 mins later there's another one. the exact same size as the first 2. as soon as i saw it, it was gone exactly like the first 2. i couldn't help but notice because they were bright white but not like shining lights or the moon. they did not appear luminous, just white but perfectly shaped circles. i wasn't scared but obviously wanted to know what they might be. if i had thought someone would have believed me, i would have called 911. i am just now reporting what i saw because i got the newspaper and saw where mr. dietz saw something too. so i am telling what i saw only because someone else saw something that could have been the same thing. i would love to have been able to take a picture but they did not stay but an instant.
content.summary: 2 white circles appeared side by side then disappeared. 5 mins later 1 appeared and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I live in far west houston in fort bend county off of fm 1464.
went out on my front porch for a smoke last night around 9:15 pm. the air felt wierd, but it was very calm and quite. about 9:20 pm loud hum began and the neighborhood dogs began to bark. there was then a flash of bright light above me and to my left. i was facing and looking east. i looked up and saw a slow moving, very bright light that turned yellow, then blinked a couple of times before turning orange. followed it for about 5 to 10 seconds before it turned north and disappeared or excelerated upward at a very high speed. it semed to blend in with the stars. afterwards and today i am feeling very energized.
content.summary: Slow moving bright light.

content.detailedDescription:
There were three bright lights in a triangle formation, two in front and one behind them, so they moved and then they formed a perfect line while moving. this event i've watched two times in 2004. i was in m���nster and walking at that time, as i noticed this strange formation, it was so huge that one couldn't miss it. i immediately saw that it was an extraordinary triangle, not a normal formation of planes.
i tryed to explain it as  a formation of planes, but this formation was so huge and perfect and there were no flashing lights that i rejected this explanation. i was really amazed and excited and watched it until it disappeared like satellites do.
content.summary: Huge bright triangle moved into three lights in a line

content.detailedDescription: driving 220 south at roughly 6:45 am , i was approaching my u turn lane when i happened to notice a very bright light resembling a star high above the location of my wife's place of employment. this place is to the left of me while driving south. sure it was early in the am, and the sun was low, but the morning was completely and beautifully lit and the sky was a gorgeous blue. way to late to see any stars. i said aloud "what the hell"? my wife ask "what"? i didn't respond because i was shocked and confused,and my wife was busy rummaging through the contents of the glove box anyway, so i just kept looking. like a star, it was stationary,and struck me odd. however shocked, i was driving , so i was forced to shift my sight back to the road as to enter the lane and complete the turn, because we were headed there anyway. this would give me a safe and closer look at whatever it was. i was able to make my turn to the opposite lanes and quickly enter the entrance lane to the property, i got a quick look, and the bright light relatively quickly had completely dimmed to reveal a long white wingless object resembling a baseball bat, with a flat dark surface in the front where you would think the pilots view ports, or windows would be.I can't say how high it was,(really up there) but i could clearly make out it's shape and smooth details. it was simply hovering, motionless. as we entered the property, i brought my attention to stopping the car as to get a better look, and when i looked back up in all of that blue space above us, it was simply gone! the entire thing happened so fast, i would not have been able to snap a photograph , or get video footage even if i had a camera of any type at the time. i did not see the craft leave at a high rate of speed, it was simply a case of "now you see it, now you don't". confused, i continued to scan the sky all around and it simply wasn't there. i told my wife, and she grinned at me as though for a split second that she thought perhaps i was just pulling her chain, but she instantly knew by my shock that i wasn't kidding.
content.summary: Extremely bright glow, quickly dimming to reveal white cylindrical object.

content.detailedDescription:
The encounter was a the eve of palm sunday,2006. the day was filled with making pieogies, as per usual for easter sunday. i was not exhausted, everyone went to bed and i laid on my sofa and fell asleep. i know i was lying on my back with my left arm toward the back of the couch. during the night i felt a sting of what i can think of as an injection, it semi-woke me and on impulse, pushed it away,it was a continuos series of at least 6-7 times, with me doing the same thing, pushing it away. the injections were so sharp, like that of a tetnus shot, but i was still in such a sleep, but not in dream like state. the next morning i went to get up to make breakfast and when i stood i was so dizzy, i thought i had a stroke (i just turned 50 this mar.) i could not stand vertically and was only comfortable in a horizontal postion, so i laid in bed most of the day watching tv. it wasn't untill hours later that my arm started throbbing and everything from the middle of the night came back to me. and a very "strong" intuitive voice said "aliens". the thing about it is that it does not "bother" me, mentally, physically, yes, every day. i can stand or walk by a radio or cd player that is not operating and will get a buzzing sound, a broken up buzzing, like a telgraph sound and when that happens the energy from the radio will act in the same way within my arm. my husband believes me (a mechanical engineer) and sees how i re-act when the buzzing sounds, others i have told also see how i react and hear the buzzing(?) sound. it hurts! i have tried to make contact with other sites and even some guys that my friend (a well-known psychic) i had written to and no answers. so i left it and live with it. until recently...My arm is so sore and is in a constant throb, exactly where the site is on my arm. my arm is so heavy, which is not good for a hair stylist and yoga instructor. this past sat. aug.2, was the worst day with this...It just hurt so bad and throbbed and throbbed, just one small area. when i woke sunday morning and was reading the newspaper out on my patio i felt sooo tired immediately and went over to my yard swing and fell asleep for 2 1/2 hours, got up went to bed for another 2 hours...I was out of it for 2 days, and the site on my arm is still quite noticable, more than usual for the past two years. i have no clue what is going on. the only person i talked to outside my immediate family and friends was my chiropractor, thinking he could have it x-rayed, well that did not pan out...Lol..He left town. 
i did look on your homepage for people that can help, but no one is near me. 
also while reading your web-page (mostly all of it) there is a part on medical(?). i do not know if this story pertains to anything, i just find it odd that 3 people had said the same thing. twenty-five yrs ago,after my fourth son, i had a tubal ligation after delivery. last september i woke at 3 in the morning with such pangs in my lower abdomin that i went to the emergency room. there they gave me an internal scan of everything and the tech asked me when i had a hysterectomy, and i said i never had one, she dismissed it with ovaries being hidden. so with much "new" health issues i went to all new dr.S and my ob-gyn during exam had asked me when i had a hysterectomy, again, i said i never had one...She just went oh, and left it at that. with me being on the holistic side i went to an iridologist and the first thing she asked my after examining my eyes...Is..When did you have a hysterectomy?  wow...Three different people in three weeks.
i do and am taking this so serious and am wondering if you can lead me in any directions to resolve this mystery. like i said, i am not frightened, curious, oh yes! my site is throbbing as i write. 
thank you for anything you can do and for your time.
lee
content.summary: When i was asleep on my couch, i was awoken by 6-7 injections in my left arm...Whatever it is. is still there in my left arm..

content.detailedDescription:
The whole day in particular started out strange. when i had woke up there was a very peculiar aroma. after about ten minutes of smelling this odor i had realized that it was almost a mix of decarbonated orange soda and vaseline. the odor disapearred mysteriously after i exited my shower. the day went normal from there until about 11ish. i was walking home from the town fair (which is a very rural area) and in the middle of a farmed field i smelt the odor again. i shrugged it off believing it to be air pollution. as i started walking thru a thicket full of raspberry's and willows and whatnot. the odor became very strong and intense all of the sudden. i then fell over sickened by its overwhelming power. my legs felt as if they were being pricked by needles. but the weirdest feeling was in all of my joints, i felt an intense pressure. almost as if ballons were expanding in my kneecaps. after about 45 seconds of this it abrubtly stopped. then a very deep rumbling sound came thru, almost shaking the very strong rooted ponderosa pines around me. i used my remaining strength to look up at a 45 degree angle and see a very large cigar shaped object flash with green lights. but then it flickeed and all of the sudden it wasn't there. almost as it had turned on an invisibility cloak. the sound slowly faded, but as i continued to look up i could still see flashes of light once in awhile being distorted by the invisibilty cloak. it took another 45 minutes till i was able to gather strength to walk to my house. it was almost like the ship had paralyzed me until it was far far away out of any danger. i experienced no later effects from the incident. 


p.S. just a note to add. when the ship was lifting off it had the strange resemblence to a human penis, i kno it sounds strange but it gave off that appearance.

inclosed is a rough sketch of the encounter
content.summary: Cigar shaped object with glowing green lights

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home and had just got out of the car and seen something sphere shaped shoot up into the sky for some reason it was smoking from i guess the back,it was moving so fast it definitly wasn't a plane they cant go that fast.It passed around 30-40 feet or more away from us.It moved incredibly fast there were 2 witnesses including myself.We looked at it for about a second while it moved then it dissapeared.I felt scared out of my mind and couldnt move.
content.summary: Sphere small fast

content.detailedDescription: My dog was barking and very active. he is not normally this way unless he is bothered by something. i followed him to the front door and looked up. there was a very bright light but not a star or a airplane. it dropped down from where it was and as it dropped it got dimmer then it went away and as it did it got dimmer very fast i mean it happened in about 3 or 4 seconds. from bright to gone.
content.summary: Bright light brighter than any other in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Witness was awaken early at 1:30 am by pet dog barking at something out the window. witness look out window and saw a disk about 80 feet away hovering over a close by pond. see graphic and photos attached. the object was approximately 30 feet above an artificial pond approximately 80 feet from the witness. the pond is 230 by 55 feet. there are several fruit and small maple trees between the witness home and pond. the disk was observed through and above the trees as shown in the graphic. the disk was approximately 30 feet in diameter and 15 thick. the sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes until the object just disappeared.

this sighting occurred between thunder storms on this evening. a storm has pass through a couple of hours previous and the sky was broken clouds with between cloud lighting occurring. there was no wind during the sighting event. the lighting flashes in the sky lit up the disk when they occurred. red rectangular lights on the bottom portion of the craft rotated from right to left and reflected off the pond surface. the bottom of craft appeared to be a metallic blue with a shimmer to it. water in the pond below the craft appeared to ripple. the dome on the craft was unlit.
content.summary: Disk over nearby pond

content.detailedDescription: We saw a light in the sky at approximatly 10:40pm, i was coming home from work on my bike while my brother was coming down the same street, we stop and talk and he looks up, he said to me did you see that? i looked up and i saw this wierd light making geometric shapes at maybe a 45 degree angle from where we were standing. we road back towards shoprite ( where i work) and went into the woods right behind the store to a small apparment complex, we looked up and it was still there, making the same patterns almost like it was mapping the area. we decide to go home but on our way out i see a car of a friend and tell him about the experience, he follows us and sees the same thing. eventually an airplane crossed it's path and the light seemed to hide, a flash of bright blue light was seen and after the plane passed, the light came back making the same shapes in the sky. we were confused , a little frightened and very shocked. we eventually agreed to finally go home, looking back as we left. as we got home we looked in the direction and it was gone.
content.summary: It was a ghostlike blob of light. it was circular.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter woke up crying around 11pm. i brought her ot the kitchen for a drink and i looked out my kitchen window. window faces north - looking towards the doylestown area. i see a very bright light hovering in the distance. i watch it slowly climb and pause to hover once. then in an instant its like the aircraft "turns" and i see multi colored flashing lights and the craft appears much further away than before. it the travels accross the sky out of view - traveling south west. as i think what this was and rememebr seeing it around the 16th of july around 1 am. he light strikes me as way too bright.  if it ws a landing light i thought it shoudl get closer or farher from me - not hover. then i see another bright light same as the first and this one climbs and hoovers slower than the first. this one appeared to the right of where the first one had been. it spent a few minutes climbing and hoovering until it "instantly turns" it seem, the lights change instantly and the aircraft departs quickly in the same path as the first.

i know this bright light was way too large and bright to be a landing light. it did not search for anything and i could not see the aircraft. it appears to be somewhere in the doylestown or bedminster area. 

after a fewminutes i did start to feel paniced as i realized i have not seen aircraft act liek this before. i also felt that light was too bright to be a landing light. the light never appeared to get closer until it "changed appearances" into the flashing lights and took off.
content.summary: 2 very bright lights seen hovering in the distance. instanlty lights change and shapes take off accross the sky

content.detailedDescription:
driving home in residential area of alexandria, va; saw large cylinder at treetop level, slowly heading north.  object hovered between trees for approx 10 seconds.  it then seemed to disappear.  initially thought it was balloon or missile, except that it was hovering more than moving.  object brilliantly shiny, sun reflected off the surface.  surface was smooth, evenly colored, without texture.  the center seam had evenly spaced "bumps" along the center of the craft.  as i watched it, i seemed entraced by its reflective surface.
 
 approximate dimensions 30-40 feet long by 35 feet diameter.  

 object made me feel very uneasy, as i initailly thought it was a missile.  then when i noticed it was hovering, i was more intrigued.

 neighborhood sits atop a tall hill, object was hovering approx 50 feet off the ground between a stand of trees.

 object made no noise; had no lights.

 weather: clear skies, 3 hours after brief summer rain storm.
content.summary: Shiny, silver cylinder with horizontal seam sighted over residential area, suburb of dc

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back deck which faces west when a glint of sunlight high in the sky cuaght my eye. it was to early in the evening to be a first star so i setup my telescope to have a look. i could easily resolve the object to a perfect sphere which looked like a whitish glass ball. the object appeared to be well above the odd high whispy clouds. as far as its apparent size goes it would appear two or three times the size of jupiter viewed with the same lens. at fisrt i had to move telescope often
to keep it centered in eyepiece than it stopped moving completely. i tried
a few different eye pieces but a 25 mm lens gave the clearest view. what happened next is difficult to describe to say the least.An explosion or some massive release of energy occured. something resembling a fireworks
exploding, chasing a whitish halo outwards for a great  distance. the original sphere shape was no longer clear, but an object began to move south west again, becoming two objects.Shortly,trees blocked my view.As far as the way i feel about this sighting is that nothing seams surprising
but always amazing.
content.summary: Viewed a sphere shaped object  high in western sky through telescope

content.detailedDescription:
this happened 5 years ago. i always feel wierd telling people so thats why i turned to you guys. here goes. we live right in the middle of town. me and my daughter were outside practicing catch. it was her first year playing t-ball. we had been playing for about 30 minutes. i stopped to look up too see if there were any clouds. i was a very clear day, not a single cloud anywhere to be seen. and it just so happened that when i looked up, and slightly to the north, i noticed what at first glance was an airplanes lights. the red and blue lights on the wings. as i was about to dismiss it as an airplane i took a longer look. and asked my daughter if she could see it also. (which of course she couldnt). what i saw was very high in the sky, it was somewhat difficult to see, unless you knew just where to look.What i noticed was not a commercial airliner at all. there was the red and blue lights. but there was also a green colored light as well. i say that the object was triangular because of this. it appeared like a red blue and green  light bunched together. as this object moved from the north to the south very slowly, it rotated in a  clockwise motion slowly ,but noticably. i watche the object for about 4 minutes then i decided to get the camera to try to snap a few pictures of it.  i went into the house for about 1 minute and when i came out it was still in the sky. it hadnt moved much at all.  i was unable to get any photos, because i could not locate the objet through the sights of my camera. so i just sat there watching this thing until it was out of my sifght. i watched for about 13 to 15  minutes. the only thing that i thought that it might be was maybe some kind of satalite or something. this object was very high in the sky, in fact had there been clouds i would not have seen it at all. after the sighting, i went inside the house and called 2 of the television stations just to see if they had anything on radar. i didnt report it as a u.F.O. i was just asking if there anything in our particular area. one of the stations blew me off, and one of them actually said that they would look into it. they got my address and phone number. but of course i never heard fom them. 

     i know that i saw something. i do not know what it was, but there was something up there just cruising along. i believe that i was not a terrestrial aircraft because of the way that it was slowly rotating. and it was moving to slow to be some kind of airplane. and it was very high. i know that i saw this object, i cant explain it, i just wish that someone else had witnessed it with me.
content.summary: Tri-colored object rotating in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I've already sent you the information on my "would-be sighting."  this is a follow up email to let you know that i found perhaps what could be additional evidence.  

i was cutting the grass today and happened to notice two circles in the tall grass that were longer and greener than the rest of the grass.  a rough guess would be that the circles were each 20' in circumference.  one was in the approximate area where i had viewed the lights in the pictures i sent previously.  the other was farther to the left of our backyard.  i saw nothing in that area.

i will attach the pictures i took of the grass.  i do have more if you wish to see them but these are the ones that turned out the best.

pictures 49 & 50 were in the area where i saw the lights.  #62 is of the other circle.  please note that i had started cutting through the first circle before i realized that this might be important evidence.

of course, i am not sure what this was but i thought it seemed strange.

thank you
content.summary: I saw 3 lights equally spaced apart.

content.detailedDescription:
Thursday august 7th 2008
event ���oshkosh wi exhibitor spot 36 
saturday august 2nd- 9:49pm
reporter ���  ��� commercial pilot asel amel cfi

after a long night at oshkosh as a exhibitor for an unnamed company, the 4 workers and myself sat down around 9:30 after putting out our tents and started discussing the day and aviation in general. we were watching shooting stars and watching the sky as many of us find as an enjoyment before going to sleep. right at 9:49, an bright light appeared in the southern sky (looked like landing lights at first), note the airport is closed to all operations after 8pm local time. all of our group was very surprised by this and thought it to be an aircraft in distress. as the object approached the airfield, it was traveling directly north, at an estimated 2,000 ft (aprox only, we cannot verify this), and crossed just to the west of the airfield, paralleling runway 18/36. as it got closer many of the group members took snap shots and video, which many are blurry etc but it was there. as the object came within viewing distance, the only visible part was a large flame. this flame was twice the size of jupiter in the southern sky. it was moving fairly slow, less that 100kts as it moved over the airfield, and it resembled the flame of a hot air balloon, but was silent. we had the knowledge that hot air balloons do not fly at night and that they are easily heard from the ground, and also the flame never went out, like many times happens in a hot air balloon. this object moved to the north of the airfield, we aprox. over top of the north 40 area, and it made a left 45 degree turn, and rapidly departed the area, not only gaining altitude, but it increased its lateral distance from us at a tremendous rate. all of the members of the group fly for a profession; (commercial and private pilots) were all in stun having never seen this before. this object lasted 3-4 minutes of duration as it moved over the area. we immediately notified the chicago artcc for a possible aircraft in distress (they notified cap) also, we contacted the ufo reporting hotline as this was a ufo (could be hot air balloon but it is not likely) there for we classified it as a ufo. chicago artcc said they had nothing on radar and we also confirmed this with flightaware.Com. this report is to reflect the phone call to the ufo reporting hotline, and shall supplement that. if any clarification is needed please contact me. photos have been attached.
content.summary: Flame over oshkosh airventure

content.detailedDescription: I was reviewing my security cameras. i have been reviewing security images for 9 years and have never seen anything like this. it flew in a swooping motion & was gone very fast. i tried to pick it up on other cameras but it flew out of range. it looked like its wings were connected at the back of the body, not the middle birds, bats, etc. eyes looked big, round and dark- like a possum. the creature looked like it might be clear or possibly glowing/reflective. very strange. i have video of it & have shown other employees and a customer & none of us know what to make of it. the video quality isn't great, but if someone has the equipment to clean it up & figure out what it is, i'd like to know.
content.summary: Some type of unknown flying creature or spirit maybe- on video

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed them in my car when turning onto olive blvd from barham, where you can see all the way down olive to the mountain. they were clear as day, five spheres moving in formation, much too slowly to be planes. it almost seemed like they were moving too slow to even be able to fly. they were way too small to be blimps and shiny metallic. i would estimate they were about 2.5 miles away or less, and following the path of the 5 freeway. i also thought it was odd, because they appeared "locked" in formation with absolutely zero individual movement. i immediately went for my camera, because they just didn't seem to belong.

as i was fumbling to grab my camera, i lost track of them once getting into the turning lane onto hollywood way, as they were blocked by the tall buildings. i was surprised to see them again when getting to hollywood way and riverside drive, where i finally got this picture. there are only four in this picture, because the 2nd from the right is blocked by the tree. i was getting honked at by people behind me and everyone walking on the street was looking to see what i was trying to get a picture of. i couldn't tell if they could see from their vantage points.

i pulled over at the 76 station at hollywood way and alameda to get better pictures out of my car, but i could no longer locate them anywhere in the sky. it was very frustrating not being able to find them anywhere in the sky, especially after just getting a picture of them less than a minute before.
content.summary: Formation of 5 spheres above burbank

content.detailedDescription:
The attached photo's are from sts 75 shuttle tether science mission. taking the film and breaking it down into single frames of film we were able to extract these phto's. 
each photo has nasa's digital finger print from the shuttle mission.
i have many more photo's of the craft and alien's. 
if you have not seen the u-tube sts 75 tether video please view.
please contact by e-mail for all information.
we would be glad to digitally reconstruct how the pictures were produced from nasa's film footage.
content.summary: Sts 75 tether shuttle science mission ccd video camera single frame photo's extracted.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my front yard, i don't know how to explain this but i was sitting on my couch and felt compelled to go outside and look at the sky.

after a few minutes of looking up, all of a sudden appeared a blue spherical energy form, it would move around in circles, disappear and instantaneously appear elsewhere and repeat the same motion, for about a minute and a half until just vanishing.

my feeling was amazement.

later on that night i lost time i think 20-30 minutes, i mean i was wide awake and then i was foggy but awake elsewhere no in between. i have no recollection of what happened in this lapse..

i should note there was another individual in the neighborhood whom also saw this(this individual wishes to remain anonymous).

i was telepathically/empathically communicated with.

i would also like to note that within seconds of this object disappearing there were helicopters, though being that i am less than .25 miles away  from otis air force base this may have been coincidence(i don't think so though)

i hope this information helps some,
peace be with you
content.summary: Blue energetic ball, disappears/reappears

content.detailedDescription:
The part i cut out was watching it approach less than 2/10 mile east of me. it appeared as a amber solid light approaching and then it started to blink. it slowly came west and i thought it would go down neighbors yard like most do. i could tell it was watching me, because it drifted past the telephone pole on my side of the road, and i knew it was going to check me out. it came within 100 feet? and was above my creek maybe 75 feet hovered. i was scared and watched it through viewfinder of camera. i watched as it turn on light to show a seperation of windows and then it turned on a whole light that was contained within. i kept my other eye closed, because i was so focused on trying to get steady shot, and was terrified at first. i then felt like it just wanted me to know that he was taking my picture too and a feeling of love overtook my fear. it drifted down my creek and went behind my sycamore tree and i lost him for awhile.  can you see where it shows a division of lights before it turns to solid light? my first instinct is, it was a disc. i really don't know. i just felt love emitting, after the fear subsided. this is not the first time it visited me. it appeared as a amber ball that circled my pine tree and got so excited that it scared me and i mentally told him to back off. 

the blinking light was all i could see for awhile. if i was to guess, i would say 25 to 30 diameter. not really sure. i may be late answering questions till week-end.  another issue i had was, i was thinking it was possible this thing changed while observing me. my ears were popping and plugged feeling like when barometric pressure changes. my hair was static feeling. the first time i saw it, my camera got static while filming and i had lines in looking through viewfiner. i don't think it showed up on film.My low battery signal came on but i was on ac, my setting of infinity changed. it might have been coincidence.
content.summary: Orange ball of light

content.detailedDescription: We were out in the woods on a new moon with no artificial light contamination, camping. we were on our backs in a small 2 person 3 season tent. i looked up and saw a small dull glowing pinkish object about the size of a large grain of rice at arms length. my partner saw it and it was slowly traveling across a part of the sky. straight up and a wee bit to the south. then it was joined by 4 or 5 other little glowing objects, some bluish, some greenish to my perception. they seemed to behave like dolphins do when swimming in a pod. at one point a small bright white speck blazed a straight line across the sky in the same area. it was probably a satellite as we have seen many of those on dark nights. one of the glowing little objects took off after it weaving back and forth. it was hard to determine how far away or how large they were. they seemed to be oval in shape, maybe! they would disappear occasionally as i think there was a few puffs of clouds or mist that night. they then would reappear as if coming out behind this vapor. so i know they were higher then the clouds.
content.summary: A swarm of glowing objects swimming together or playing?

content.detailedDescription: I saw a solid bright white oval light traveling at a high rate of speed across the las vegas sky from west to east. it did a zig zag pattern and then went straight up and disappeared. it was way too fast to be an airplane or helicopter. it crossed the entire las vegas valley in less than a minute,then shot up right before it reached nellis airforce base on the northeast side of the valley.
content.summary: Bright white light traveling at a high rate of speed in a zig zag pattern

content.detailedDescription: I was to stay allnight with a cousin of mine. we were in a pasture next to his house playing ball. we both looked up at the same time and saw this ufo. it absolutely scared us to death. the object appeared to be no more than 100 ft. in yhe air. from the time we saw it until the time it appeared to land behind some trees was no more than 20 to 25 sec. we both ran to jimmy's house as fast as we could and told his parents. after this i decided to go back to my on home and tell my parents. they just kind of laughed it off. it was as real as i amsitting here now. it is something i will never forget. jimmy and i talked about it for 2 or 3 yrs. unfortunitley jimmy  died not to much later.
content.summary: Ufo spoteted in 1965

content.detailedDescription: Approx 9:50 pm i walked out on my deck & saw two very bright objects side by side in the se sky.At the time they were both not moving. i immidiattly called my girlfriend to come out & see. she came out & the one object (further to the east) suddenly took off to the east & was gone in about 3-4 seconds. the other object stayed in roughly the same place for the next 1/2 hour or so.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Gold/yellow objects
